notes.text: Updated Satellite Client packages that fixes Low security bugs and regular bugs are now available for Red Hat Satellite.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
Red Hat Satellite is a system management solution that allows organizations
to configure and maintain their systems without the necessity to provide
public Internet access to their servers or other client systems. It
performs provisioning and configuration management of predefined standard
operating environments.

Security fix:
* puppet-agent: curl: cookie injection with none file
(CVE-2023-38546)
notes.title: Details

notes.title: Terms of Use

publisher.issuing_authority: Red Hat Product Security is responsible for vulnerability handling across all Red Hat offerings.
publisher.name: Red Hat Product Security

document.title: Red Hat Security Advisory: Red Hat Satellite Client bug fix and security update

cwe.name: External Control of File Name or Path

notes.text: A flaw was found in the Curl package. This flaw allows an attacker to insert cookies into a running program using libcurl if the specific series of conditions are met.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: curl: cookie injection with none file
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: The flaw requires a series of conditions to be met and the likeliness that they shall allow an attacker to take advantage of it is low. Even if the bug could be made to trigger, the risk that a cookie injection can be done to cause harm is additionally also low.
notes.title: Statement

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

remediations.details:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.

For details on how to apply this update, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

vulnerabilities.title: curl: cookie injection with none file
